item.name: Italian Seafood Stew
item.description: A hearty tomato-based stew packed with crab, shrimp, mussels, and fish, served with toasted bread..

item.name: Chicken Alfredo Tortellini
item.description: Plump tortellini filled with chicken and cheese, smothered in a creamy Alfredo sauce with fresh parsley.

item.name: Garlic Butter Prawn Spaghetti
item.description: Spaghetti coated in a luscious garlic butter sauce with succulent prawns, chili flakes, and parsley.

item.name: Pepperoni pizza
item.description: Spicy pepperoni slices over a rich tomato base with melted mozzarella..

item.name: cheese pizza
item.description: A cheesy delight featuring mozzarella, parmesan, gorgonzola, and ricotta.

item.name: Vegetarian Delight
item.description: A colorful mix of bell peppers, onions, olives, mushrooms, and cherry tomatoes

item.name: Braised Short Ribs
item.description: Tender beef short ribs slow-cooked in red wine sauce, served with creamy polenta

item.name: Chicken Cacciatore
item.description: Braised chicken cooked with tomatoes, bell peppers, and olives for a rustic flavor.

item.name: Beef Braciole
item.description: Thinly sliced beef rolled with garlic, parsley, and cheese, simmered in marinara sauce.

item.name: Lobster Fra Diavolo
item.description: Lobster tail simmered in a spicy tomato sauce, served over linguine.

item.name: Shrimp Scampi
item.description: Succulent shrimp sautéed in garlic butter and white wine, served over angel hair pasta.

item.name: Seafood Fra Diavolo
item.description: Spaghetti loaded with mussels, clams, and calamari in a spicy tomato sauce.

item.name: bruschetta
item.description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.

item.name: Caprese Salad
item.description: Slices of fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil, drizzled with olive oil and balsamic reduction.

item.name: Antipasto Platter
item.description: A mix of cured meats, cheeses, olives, roasted peppers, and marinated vegetables.

item.name: garlic bread
item.description: crispy, buttery bread infused with garlic and herbs, sometimes topped with cheese

item.name: Arancini
item.description: Golden, crispy-fried risotto balls stuffed with cheese or meat.

item.name: Negroni
item.description: A timeless cocktail made with gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth, offering a balance of bitter and sweet.

item.name: Espresso
item.description: A strong and rich Italian coffee, served in a small cup but packed with bold flavor.

item.name: Cappuccino
item.description: A beloved Italian coffee drink, combining espresso, steamed milk, and a velvety foam topping.

item.name: Bellini
item.description: A delightful cocktail made with Prosecco and fresh peach purée, originating from Venice.

item.name: CHIANTI
item.description: A classic Italian red wine from Tuscany, known for its bold flavor and smooth finish.
